content:

Action:5

Action:5

I'm moving upwards to position (row5, col1) so that I can then traverse right and ultimately approach the key from above, avoiding the wall at row6 col5 as planned.

I'm moving downward to pick up the key at (7,6), expecting the nokey character to transform into a withkey state so we can eventually open the door.

Action:3

I'm moving right to start a detour path that will eventually take me upward and around obstacles, aiming to reach the door at (1,10) with the key.

I'm moving right to head towards column 10, which aligns with a clearer upward path toward the door at row1 col10 and fits our strategy of using the key-bearing unit to complete the level.
